name: prompt-refiner
description: Comprehensive prompt engineering toolkit: refine, analyze, compare, and manage prompts with style variants and templates.

tools.name: refinePrompt
tools.description: Generate 4 refined variants (concise, detailed, creative, analytical) with instant React UI display

tools.name: analyzePrompt
tools.description: Analyze prompt quality with feedback on clarity, specificity, and improvement opportunities

tools.name: getPromptTemplates
tools.description: Access pre-built prompt templates for common BA tasks (requirements, user stories, documentation, analysis)

tools.name: compareVariants
tools.description: Side-by-side comparison of variants with highlighted differences and use case recommendations

tools.name: exportPrompts
tools.description: Export refined prompts in multiple formats (markdown, JSON, plain text) for documentation

tools.name: favoriteVariant
tools.description: Mark prompts as favorites to build a library of proven, reusable prompts

tools.name: getHistory
tools.description: View refinement history with expandable cards, filters, and search
